<title level="1" right="Focus 6" pfs="Standard">
[Champion's Sacrifice](/Spells.aspx?ID=2050)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 256 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** An ally is hit by a Strike or fails a saving throw against an effect that doesn’t affect you.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** the triggering ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You form a link with an ally, allowing you to take harm in their stead. All the effects of the hit or failed save are applied to you instead of the target. For example, if the target critically fails a saving throw against a [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530), you would take double damage. These effects ignore any resistances, immunities, or other abilities you have that might mitigate them in any way, although those of the target apply before you take the effect.
name: Champion's Sacrifice
